name: Keep
summary: Fort Building and Survival. You are thrown into an apocalyptic medieval world that is overrun by undead and other fiends. You must build a Keep to stay safe and revive and protect it from not just the undead, but other players. If you die, you join the undead on their hunt for the remaining living players. Last player left alive wins. If you have a keep which is not overrun, you can respawn there.
